website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Ativ Book 9 Pro is a premium desktop-replacement laptop with stellar build quality, a sharp 4K touch display, and fast hardware.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase on the Samsung brand Generation to generation and they keep getting better I use this for everything including traveling for work and this laptop is the best I have had. The fast device charge on the side is a plus. The slim and light weight are great for traveling and clients love the touchscreen.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop overall, minor limits on touch screen
customer_reviews.text: Awesome laptop. Needed a second one for my business. One in the field, one for home but needed portability in case of field failures. Fast, beautiful screen and sound system is superior to my HP laptop which I still use. Touch screen is OK but because it doesn't swivel around, the usefulness is limited. The monitor only bends back so far, so I use a Bluetooth keyboard and elevated platform at home for more ergonomic use. Price is HALF of retail when I bought it and it runs lightning quick on tougher applications like VISIO. No real complaints, and won't be replacing this for some time. Very pleased overall and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: It's a turd, don't waste your money on it. I originally bought it for work since it was on sale and on paper it seemed like a decent laptop. However I had nothing but issues with it. It has a chronic problem with the browsers crashing and reimaging the laptop doesn't help. Aside from this, every Java IDE that I have used on it has had problems. Each one crashes or never loads up for me while they work fine on another device. I think I might have received a faulty laptop but I regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont think more money is worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worst experience I have ever had. Most money I have ever spent. Horrible mistake. Touch screen worked. Had no cursor. How do I work with no cursor it's kind of important. So much money for bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: BraxtonDos

customer_reviews.title: Great But...
customer_reviews.text: Great computer it does everything I need it to from running high framed games to photo editing. My only complaint is a short battery life. I've clocked and hour and a half to 2 hour battery life. I'm sure it'll do just about anything you need it to. For me personally the 8 ramm is more than enough for what I do.
customer_reviews.author: Reno

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop ever. Super fast super highquality design. If Samsung continued in the laptop sector they would take over
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is compact enough to travel and big enough to see photo program screens.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Everything is amazing, except for the battery
customer_reviews.text: It's an incredible machine, you will never see it lag, the trackpad is very precise and the screen is the most beautiful thing I have never seen, specially with the outdoor mode on. The only problem is the small battery. It will last 4 hours and a half, no more.
customer_reviews.author: Luis David

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: I am loving the laptop, and so far it has been able to perform all of the digital editing work that I have done on it. And it also has a really nice feel to it
customer_reviews.author: Omari

customer_reviews.title: Since I got it very pleased. I noted atract dust and get some warm ...
customer_reviews.text: Since I got it very pleased. I noted atract dust and get some warm but very happy to have this machine which I have not squized yet and seems very powerful. I got some pads to do not scracht the aluminium with watch metal bracelets
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Despite an average battery life, the laptop is really good - fast and reliable. I am very satisfied with it so far. I am using it for general purposes such as internet browsing and some software programs.
customer_reviews.author: Gegenvalis

customer_reviews.title: The touchpad mouse stops working after a few days (taps ...
customer_reviews.text: The touchpad mouse stops working after a few days (taps don't work), and the only way to recover is to reboot the laptop. The mouse is overly sensitive. All these issues persisted across laptop replacements. So I wonder if there's a systemic design issue here.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: I like it, glad I have it. Think it was too expensive compared to other deals on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I am still having some fun trying to figure out Win 10, but other than that, this Laptop is excellent. but while it is a touch screen device, it does not open all the way around like many other notebook touch screens... it opens up about 140 degrees or so, but no further.
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: This is still great (comparing to others)
customer_reviews.text: So far, every single aspect of this laptop is as explained and it is outperforming any other similar ones in the market. If you use it without charging frequently, however, the battery may be problematic. Although there is a way to extend the battery life to 5 to 6 hours, you should lose the process speed which is one of the most attractive features (2.5Mhz) all the way down to 1.0. This is still great (comparing to others), and you will hardly ever perceive the difference if you use basic functions (web browsing, documenting, etc.), rather than games.
customer_reviews.author: Tallyguy

customer_reviews.title: FAST AND LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this notebook 3 times for my customers. They really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Max Pynchon

customer_reviews.title: Never buy Samsung.
customer_reviews.text: Processor fan started clicking 6 months after purchase. Customer service was unhelpful. Never buy Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop in this segment, with day to day productivity work it always remains calm and cool.
customer_reviews.author: Prince Chauda

customer_reviews.title: crashes after 10 month and there is no local warranty service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop and right after 10 month started to give me blue screen and crashes several times a day. Since the product carries international warranty for 12 month, i contacted Samsung service in US and asked where i can drop this machine in my country for repairing and then i was informed that there is no service center there and i have to return the product back to US for repairing. the cost of sending it to US is 200 USD and to bring it back around 100 USD so in total it is around 300 USD which is half of the price of purchasing a new laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Mourad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE SAMSUNG ATIV BOOK 9 PRO 15.6" 4K HD IS VERY FASTEST SPEED.
customer_reviews.author: ADRIAN MARTIN QUINN

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it is so slow. the computer speed is onl 4 mps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best 4K Ultrabook For 2017 !!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best laptop deal terms of display (Bright 4K Touchscreen !!!) design, ruggedness and overall value. Solid as a rock, lightweight, stunning black metal design, super-fast processor, perfect keys and touchpad. Cons would be non-upgradable memory (but you can upgrade its ssd hard drive!) and poor battery life due directly because its fast I7-6700U CPU and 4K Display are battery hogs. However, you can eek out at around 6 hours by changing power setting for battery to - Max CPU 40% and Screen Brightness 80%.
customer_reviews.author: Dave From Boca

customer_reviews.title: battery problem
customer_reviews.text: I have had this laptop for 3 years now. I was very please with it for a long time. I am have problem with starting the computer for the past month or so. I have to keep pushing the start button many times(on and off, on and off...) before it will actually starts. I took it to Samsung for repair. They are saying it is the battery. But unfortunately, they do not made that particular battery anymore. They are asking me to buy a new computer to replace this one. This is totally unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: legnanoc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Samsung Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Incredible Design and Incredible speed. Everything is instantaneous. Awesome touch screen Ultra HD screen.
customer_reviews.author: calc

product_meta.title: Samsung ATIV Book 9 Pro 15.6" 4K Ultra HD Touch-Screen Laptop - Intel Core i7-6700HQ - 8GB Memory - 256GB SSD - NVIDIA GTX 950M - Pure Black
product_meta.description: The notebook 9 Pro is Samsung's powerful performance laptop with Intel's Core i7 CPU, 256GB SSD, 8GB of RAM, and 4K UHD touch screen display with real-time HDR technology.
feature_bullets: 4K UHD touch screen Display with real-time HDR
